Package swervelib.simulation.ironmaple.simulation.opponentsim

Class SmartOpponentConfig.ChassisConfig

java.lang.Object
swervelib.simulation.ironmaple.simulation.opponentsim.SmartOpponentConfig.ChassisConfig
Enclosing class:
SmartOpponentConfig
public static class SmartOpponentConfig.ChassisConfig extends Object
The SmartOpponent's Chassis Config, this is an inner config that is only chassis configuration.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    SmartOpponentConfig.ChassisConfig.ChassisOptions
    Chassis Options that MUST be set for the SmartOpponentConfig to be valid.
    static enum 
    SmartOpponentConfig.ChassisConfig.Presets
    A few chassis presets to simplify configs that don't need to be specific.

    • withSquareChassis

      public SmartOpponentConfig.ChassisConfig withSquareChassis(Distance bumperLength, Distance trackLength)
      Simplified Chassis Configuration for a square robot. Sets the bumper width and height to the same value.
      Parameters:
      bumperLength - the length of the bumpers.
      trackLength - the track width of the robot. This is from one center of the wheel to the other.
      Returns:
      this, for chaining.
